original_text: The man who was standing among the trees answered, ‘The Lord has sent these horses to go to all the places on the earth.’
korean_text: 화석류나무 사이에 선 자가 대답하여 이르되 이는 여호와께서 땅에 두루 다니라고 보내신 자들이니라

sentences.original_text: The man who was standing among the trees
sentences.korean_translation: 나무들 사이에 서 있던 그 사람이

sentences.original_text: to go to all the places on the earth.'
